channel.title: Problems with the Ip Adress for Me
channel.description: Ok, i have no-ip DUC downloaded, i haf an ip adress and everything. except when i put all the stuff in. it says error connecting to server. :(

item.title: Problems with the Ip Adress for Me
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

Type it in to your web browser then sign into your router with the username and password (Usually Default)
Click applications and gaming and add the ports save and you should be done.

Also, check your computers firewall and make sure it is currently OFFF[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2009, 06:27:00 am[/size][hr]Btw its not 192.168.0.1 for everyone…

Read full topic
item.source: Problems with the Ip Adress for Me

item.title: Problems with the Ip Adress for Me
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

no dont keep ure firewall off due to virus and stuff

Basically ive told a few about this…

heres a specific guide to show you wat to do.

1.click on ure connection
2.click on properties
3.click advanced
4.click firewall settings.
5.then click advanced again
6.the click settings that appear at top
7.then click add.
8.A box will appear asking you to create a new connection basically
fill it out in top box put [my server] ,then 2nd box put 192.168.0.1 then 3rd box put 43594 or 5555 up to you peope prefer 43594.
9.last not east click then TCP then your done click ok and basically close it all.

Now people can get on your’e server

Read full topic
